Reviews.Title: “Better than we expected”
Reviews.Author: Young_couple28
Reviews.Content: booked hotel minutecom rating 3 star twoday stay amsterdam found hotel exceeded expectations reviews excellent location rarely public transport reception staff friendly helpful directions size cosy storage huge tv bathroom clean provided fresh towels day hotel quiet street despite close centre disturbances convenience store 2 minutes walk nearby trams subway street previous reviews accurate possibly written picky people happily stay recommended hotel friends

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, pretty good location for price”

Reviews.Content: hotel probably 20 minute walk amsterdam centraal 5 minute walk nearest metro 2 3 stops station pretty close arent lot restaurants cafes leave hotel streets albert heijn supermarket blocks nice clean flatscreen tv wouldve preferred double bed twins pushed crack sometimes grow night pay internet buy day decent rate connection

Reviews.Title: “Close to central Amsterdam, reasonable quality for what you pay”

Reviews.Content: clean bedding clean curtains clean bathroom little dated probably upgrade clean acceptable wooden floor little squeaky annoying major issue comfortable bed facilities doubletwin bed lamps flatscreen tv desk chair kettle teamaking facilities extra chair cupboard safe shelf bag storage bathroom shower bath shower weve excellent pressure heat control mirror sink hairdryer negative toilet lean location close central amsterdam 510minutes walk bit train station 25mins walk bag internet 500 euro day fast staff provide limited printing required front desk breakfast day juices water milk coffee machine croissants various buns toast various spreads available cold meats cheese fruit yoghurt cereals scrambled eggs sausages bacon staff friendly helpful reasonable quality hotel enjoyed stay
